name: • Renaissance, or just rebirth without being the same? •
description: New times, a new story to tell, this time the story of the glorious return of ancient cultures, now reinvented but in essence the same, complicated, stylized, perfect...  In essence the same, but in essence broken, the order was lost, the perfection that was admired before is now repudiated, the sober colors disappeared, the deep ideals are now only kept by a small part of the world, a small part that now controls everything.  Minimalism erased the details of the world, but even in simplicity there are elements that make the difference, attention to error, made on purpose, becomes a new standard to worship, our ancestors, disappointed to see how we ruin all their effort to achieve perfection, want to die dead.  The world returns to its origins, but looking for the opposite, who would have thought that the solution was imperfection? the mistakes, the flaws, the details badly done on purpose but with great weight, the lack of symmetry, the psychedelic...  The world becomes simple, but very complicated...
